Sugar_Land.Central Unit: The Central Unit (C, previously the Imperial State Prison Farm and the Central State Prison Farm) was a Texas Department of Criminal Justice (TDCJ) men's prison in Sugar Land, Texas. The approximately 325.8-acre (131.8 ha) facility is 2 miles (3.2 km) from central Sugar Land on U.S. Highway 90A. The unit first opened in April 1909. The unit had 950 beds for men.
